description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Mount Gambier, Australia. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Boutique Adults-Only Country Manor in the Heart of Mount Gambier
hotels.description: Enter a world of boutique luxury and history with an elegant stay at the adults-only Delgattie Estate, a heritage property nestled in the heart of South Australia’s Mount Gambier. Established in 1902 and carefully restored as a boutique hotel, this grand country manor has just three luxuriously appointed suites in a perfect position for a romantic escape in the country. Surrounded by lush gardens, each of the individually designed suites has its own stylish ensuite, sitting area and private access, offering exclusivity and romance. When you're ready to mingle, head to the onsite Spehr Billiard Lounge & Balcony for a drink or try your hand at a game of pool on the handcrafted billiard table. Then, book a table at Bankside Dining Room, where a bespoke menu showcases some of the Limestone Coast’s finest regional produce, or try the adjacent restaurant, The Commodore restaurant, for divine cuisine and some of the region's best wines.

seo.title: Hoteles en Mount Gambier - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Mount Gambier, Australia con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
